name: CINEMA SEMENTE // IDENTITY
description:
CINEMA SEMENTE IS A GROUP OF YOUNG CINEMATOGRAPHERS, CURATORS AND ARCHITECTS WHO WANT TO FOSTER CREATION, MANAGEMENT AND MEDIATION OF AUDIOVISUAL WORKS.

IT'S BIRTH OCCURS AFTER A MULTIDISCIPLINARY INVESTIGATION, LINKED WITH THE UTOPIA OF CREATING A CINEMATOGRAPHIC SPACE IN A RURAL TOWN IN GALICIA.

WHILE CREATING A SELF-MANAGED, ALTERNATIVE CONTEXT INTO GALICIAN RURAL AREAS, THE AIM OF CINEMA SEMENTE IS TO PROMOTE DECENTRALIZATION AND DIVERSITY.

THEIR WORK IS BASED ON PERMACULTURE, FEMINISM, TRADITIONAL KNOWLEDGE, ENVIRONMENTAL RESPECT AND THE PASSION FOR
CINEMA.
